item.description:
Hayrides: Custom built Conestoga-style Hay Wagons travel on private trails through a 73 acre Christmas tree plantation and woodlands. Sing-a-long music is provided for a festive spirit and wagon sides keep everyone safe and cozy. Cost $5.00 per person.

They also have two campfire amphitheaters, each having seating for over 100. Long-handled safety forks with marshmallows are provided for a favorite toasted treat. One of the campfire sites has a raised stage area that provides a focal point for song leaders! The Campfire can also be scheduled for $1/pp or minimum of $25 per hour. Please add your comments with your YES REPLY if you'd like the campfire too (which is after the Hayride). Campfires are scheduled by Appointment Only.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet @ Main Entrance. You can call my cell (774-262-0348) if you'll be late.
item.name: Let's Go on a HAYRIDE!
